name.ja: <ruby>昂<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>光<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>天<rt>てん</rt></ruby><ruby>使<rt>し</rt></ruby>エッセル

requirement.en: During the turn you have not Special Summoned a monster.

effect.en: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, if you activated this effect during the first turn of the second player, you can Special Summon 1 monster from either Graveyard face-up to your field.
